"Oh, hey...":
"If it's all the same to you, could you stay
here and listen to me talk for a bit?"
"...It was a long battle."

"It was far from being over, but we did manage
to get a single moment of pause."
"In this endless battle against \"Lenus Retem\"."

"Just a single pause cost
us this many sacrifices."

"If we weren't able to get help from all of you,
if we'd just kept fighting as we were..."
"We would've likely lost in the end."

"We people of Retem have always resolved all
of our problems with our own strength."

"We built our own fully self-sufficient society,
never asking outsiders for help."

"It was something of a
point of pride for us."
"Sand-covered dunes."
"A mountain border."

"Our perspective must have become narrowed
by living in such an isolated world."

"When you and the girls first came to this land,
many of us looked at you with a skeptical eye."

"Some people even said there was nothing more
shameful than getting bailed out by Aelio."

"Part of the reason I first rejected your aid
was because of the opinions of those people."

"Thinking back on it now,
it was all just foolish pride."

"The people who made me
realize that were you three."

"In unfamiliar lands, you all took the
initiative to act, and you produced results."

"That sight changed the
minds of Jalil and Mohsen."
"And with them, mine as well."
"Once again, let me give you my thanks."
"Thank you for helping Retem out of our crisis."
"We all did our best."
"It's because of Manon's sharp mind."
"Yeah, we really did."
"Indeed... That girl is far too hard on herself."

"I've always had such a feeling
of shame when I stand here."
"Even now, it's still as fresh as ever..."

"But now, I can tell them
how the battle ended."

"We're here today precisely because
our predecessors fought so hard."
"And, in the end, we achieved victory."
"Not a single one of them died in vain."

"In addition, the feelings I pour into
the songs I dedicate are also changing..."
"...That reminds me, I've always been curious about this..."

"How did Manon know the words
to the \"Song of Mourning\"?"
"...I don't know."
"She does a lot of research and studying."
"I see..."

"I want to ask her herself,
but it's quite a special song."

"She might have some
circumstances of her own."

"It's a song that's been passed
down for generations in my family..."

"But it's also a song
known to many peoples."

"I suppose it wouldn't be unusual
if she had heard it somewhere before."

"...Well, I've taken up enough of your time.
Let's save that talk for later."

"If you don't mind, let's
pay our respects together."
